url.title: URL
url.description: Full URL to send search to.

group.title: Group
group.description: Group within the workspace we're sending to.

workspace.title: Workspace
workspace.description: Workspace within the deployment to send the search results to.

sendUrlTemplate.title: URL Template
sendUrlTemplate.description: Template to build the URL to send from.

searchId.title: Search Id
searchId.description: Id of the search this function is running on.

tee.title: Tee
tee.description: Tee results to search. When set to true results will be shipped instead of stats

flushMs.title: Flush period
flushMs.description: How often are stats flushed in ms

suppressPreviews.title: Suppress periodic stats
suppressPreviews.description: Disables generation of intermediate stats. When true stats will be emitted only on end
